Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: next-intl example

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

approach.involving_local_residents: involve residents and users in the design and construction of their projectsinvolve residents and users in the design and construction of their projects
approach.building_maintenance: maintenance and life of the building
approach.to_build_the_architectural_project: To build the architectural project as a shared living space
approach.every-project: Each project brings together a multidisciplinary team
approach.meeting: it's a meeting point for practices and know-how
approach.the_act_of_building: The act of building can be a unifying moment for a community
approach.imagine_an_architectural_project: imagine an architectural project as an opportunity for sharing and mediation
approach.architect_s_expertise: the architect's expertise is combined with mediation and events skills
approach.an_assembly_of_materials: A blend of materials and know-how
approach.attention_to_detail: Attention to detail and sobriety form the basis of my practice
approach.use_the_right_material: It means using the right material in the right place, without trying to revolutionize construction methods
approach.use_materials: Using materials in the right proportions
approach.rich_projects: for projects that are rich in creativity yet frugal in energy consumption
approach.disappearing_sectors: sectors that have sometimes disappeared or been diminished by the effects of globalization
approach.recycling: and to a lesser extent the recycling sector
approach.job_companion: for me, it's a job of helping people build
approach.coordinate_partners: To federate and coordinate passionate partners for each project
approach.create_opportunities: To create opportunities and spaces to reflect and build a desirable future together
